name: Sacred Dungeon
description:
Made for Wowie Game Jam 3.0

.

3 reasons to not play this game:

- no restart button

- Stats are broken when loading to other scenes

- no tutorial

.

Move Set (if you care):

- WASD/Arrows to move

- Space to enter attack mode

- Left Shift to cancel Attack Mode

- E to enteract

- Q if you get stuck in a block

.

Quick explain on the game:

- Enemies move after you

- Taking Damage unleashes Fire that damages Enemies and Destroys Wood & Creates

- Destroying Creates gives you a Coin or Pickup (pickups can increase one of your stats)

- Enemies has a chance to drop coins

- Use Keys to open Chests

- Every floor has a Exit & a Chest

- there are 5 Floors at total, then it's the end game

.
